meta.job_title: Senior Program Protection Planning and Security Support

duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in managing security requirements for PD Aerostats systems and handling sensitive information
Conduct proper information assurance (IA) for PD Aerostat programs and track IA and security training requirements
Advise the Information Assurance Manager (IAM) on IA strategies, policies, and certification requirements
Advise on risk analysis, program protection, security requirements, and program management timelines
Develop and update basic program documents, including client deliverables, multi-slide briefings, and financial analysis
Plan, organize, and lead Risk Management tasks and participate in the PEO IPT for all of Intelligence Electronics Warfare and Sensors (IEW&S)

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (desired) and no less than 5 years (required) of relevant work experience, 10 years (desired). Active DoD security clearance or the ability to obtain.
